# PixelVault - Secure Image Steganography
> A client-side web utility for hiding and encrypting text inside PNG images.

## Features
- Least Significant Bit (LSB) steganography
- AES-GCM 256-bit encryption via Web Crypto API
- Zero server-side processing; 100% browser-based privacy

## Developer
Developed by Dippan Bhusal (https://dippanbhusal.tech)

## Technical Architecture
Built with HTML5 Canvas API, Vanilla JavaScript, and CSS3. Hosted on Vercel.
